events.name: AFC Bournemouth at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Aaron Mooy and Alireza Jahanbakhsh both broke their goalscoring ducks for Brighton on Saturday as their side beat Bournemouth 2-0.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mooy stars as Brighton beat Bournemouth

headlines.description: Everton striker Dominic Calvert-Lewin kept up his fine run of form as he scored twice to give Everton a 2-1 win at Newcastle United.
headlines.shortLinkText: Calvert-Lewin double sees Everton beat Newcastle

headlines.description: Danny Ings scored his 12th Premier League goal of the season as Southampton came from a goal down to draw 1-1 with Crystal Palace at St Mary's.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ings strike gives Southampton draw with Crystal Palace

headlines.description: Watford gave their Premier League survival hopes a shot in the arm with a 3-0 home win over Aston Villa on Saturday, thanks to Troy Deeney's brace.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ten-man Watford beat Villa with Deeney double

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur played out a 2-2 draw at bottom-placed Norwich in the Premier League on Saturday as the visitors twice came from behind.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs draw at Norwich after late Kane penalty

events.name: Leicester City at West Ham United

headlines.description: Leicester City shook off chastening back-to-back defeats with a 2-1 victory at West Ham United to renew their distant chase of Liverpool.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester get win as West Ham sack Pellegrini

headlines.description: Anthony Martial and Anthony Martial scored as Manchester United beat Burnley 1-0 on Saturday as they moved up to fifth place in the standings.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martial, Rashford give Man Utd win at Burnley
